title: Quick and easy garlic chicken fried rice
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons vegetable oil, divided', '225g skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets, cut into strips', '1/2 red pepper, chopped', '3-4 spring onions, chopped', '4 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '585g cooked brown rice', '2 tablespoons light soy sauce', '1 tablespoon rice vinegar', '150g frozen peas, thawed']
